definition: sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
alas/oh dear
interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
sound/voice/tone/noise/reputation/classifier for sounds
to sigh/to exclaim
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: What parent stay for several days, moan and groan all day.
sentences.chinese: 何父住店多日，整日唉聲嘆氣。

sentences.english: Do we just sit there, sighing and complaining about it?
sentences.chinese: 難道我們就僅僅坐在這，唉聲嘆氣，抱怨嗎？

sentences.english: Don't moan and groan because of a little setback.
sentences.chinese: 不要受了一點挫折就唉聲嘆氣。

sentences.english: She calls me more often than usual , moaning and groaning.
sentences.chinese: 她比平常更頻繁的打電話給我，唉聲嘆氣地。

sentences.english: I loathe negativity. I can't stand people who moan.
sentences.chinese: 我厭惡消極態度，不能忍受唉聲嘆氣的人。

sentences.english: Huang Zhankui back to spike ridge, flustered, they are not.
sentences.chinese: 黃佔魁回到狼牙嶺，狼狽不堪，衆人也是唉聲嘆氣。

sentences.english: Have you ever sighed over the failures?
sentences.chinese: 你是否曾經因爲失敗而唉聲嘆氣？

definition: to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
stupid and ignorant (idiom)
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
to play deaf-mute
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
wicked beyond redemption (idiom)/heinous
red in the face/extremely angry
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
as to/considering/for
